title: Strategies for Overcoming Online Education Barriers and Strengthening Teaching Competencies in Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic online learning platforms and foundational language education competencies
context.additional_context: Practical, field-applicable online teaching competency enhancement program for corporate language education managers.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more technical barriers in online environments and propose solutions
Learners can develop two or more strategies to enhance learner engagement when designing online language courses
Learners can self-diagnose their teaching competencies and establish improvement plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
